THmisc 0.1.0
  • Reference

Wrapper function to load arbitrary VCF files.

load_vcf_file.Rd

Wrapper function to load arbitrary VCF files.

load_vcf_file(f, ..., verbose = TRUE, annot = TRUE)

Arguments

f

File name
...

Other optional arguments.
verbose

Verbosity flag (Default: TRUE)
annot

Flag indicating if variant annotations should be added (Default: TRUE)

Value

A 'CollapsedVCF' object.

Examples

load_vcf_file(system.file("extdata", "platypus.vcf.bgz", package = "THmisc"))
